suncertify.gui
Class Controller

java.lang.Object
  suncertify.gui.Controller

public class Controller
extends java.lang.Object

This class handles all requests from the client user interface to the data model.

Version:
1.3
Author:
Pedro Oliveira
See Also:
ConfigOptions, RecordTableModel, ClientGui, GuiException

Constructor Summary
Controller(ConfigOptions options)
          Creates an instance of the Controller class using the options configured by the user, that are used in the process of establishing a database connection.

          This method performs the booking operation in the database.

Constructor Detail

Controller

public Controller(ConfigOptions options)
           throws GuiException
Creates an instance of the Controller class using the options configured by the user, that are used in the process of establishing a database connection.

Parameters:
options - the configuration options selected by the user, used in the database connection.
Throws:
GuiException - Thrown if a connection to the database was not possible.
Method Detail

search

public RecordTableModel search(java.lang.String[] criteria)
                        throws GuiException
Returns the RecordTableModel containing all records that met the search criteria. All fields in the criteria array are evaluated for matching the start of the respective field. A null value matches any field value.

Parameters:
criteria - The user defined search String
Returns:
the RecordTableModel containing all records that met the search criteria.
Throws:
GuiException - Indicates a problem in the database or network connection.

getAllRecords

public RecordTableModel getAllRecords()
                               throws GuiException
Retrieves the RecordTableModel with all records from the database.

Returns:
the RecordTableModel containing all records.
Throws:
GuiException - Indicates a problem in the database or network connection.

bookRecord

public void bookRecord(Record record)
                throws GuiException
This method performs the booking operation in the database.

Parameters:
record - the Record to book in the database.
Throws:
GuiException - Indicates a problem in the database or network connection.

returnRecord

public void returnRecord(Record record)
                  throws GuiException
This method performs the returning operation in the database.

Parameters:
record - the Record to return in the database.
Throws:
GuiException - Indicates a problem in the database or network connection.
